section.name: Astrogrid Integration Testing
section.p: The integration tests are executed as a maven project which is processed after all of of the component maven projects. The integration tests consist of a number of JUnit tests which may be viewed using the menu on the left.

section.name: What's next?
section.p: Automatic deployment of war files following maven builds. This might mean that the integration tests are best executed from a separate cron job rather than the maven script....
